title: Garen Passive Broken?
body: I read the patch notes for 4.17 and Garens passive is supposed to scale as follows ; 0.4%, 0.8%, 2%, however upon starting a game I took a look at Garens passive and it started at 2% and then went to 4%, i didn't get to see the last increment because the game ended however in the time I had at level 11 with warmogs Garen is genning like 40hp per second....is this a bug with his passive or am i just reading something incorrectly?

replies.body:
Garen's passive is stated per 1 second.
Warmog's passive is stated per 5 seconds.
For consistency, both should be listed per 5.

0.4 per sec = 2 per 5 secs. It's just inconsistency on behalf of Rito. That sounds about right for lv 11 Garen with Warmogs, between 30 and 40 health a second. Not broken just garen :P wait untill lv 16 when he gets health regen equal to 10% of his max health.
